## Session interface

Interface of Stripe checkout session.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Session 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [allow\_promotion\_codes?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.allow_promotion_codes.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Enables user redeemable promotion codes. |
|  [automatic\_tax?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.automatic_tax.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether automatic tax is enabled for the session |
|  [cancel\_url](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.cancel_url.md) | string | The URL the customer will be directed to if they decide to cancel payment and return to your website. |
|  [client\_reference\_id?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.client_reference_id.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A unique string to reference the Checkout Session. This can be a customer ID, a cart ID, or similar, and can be used to reconcile the session with your internal systems. |
|  [created\_at](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.created_at.md) | string | Time when the session was created as a UTC timestamp. |
|  [id](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.id.md) | string | Unique identifier for the session. Used to pass to <code>redirectToCheckout()</code> in Stripe.js. |
|  [line\_items?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.line_items.md) | [LineItem](./firestore-stripe-payments.lineitem.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The array of line items purchased with this session. A session is guaranteed to contain either [Session.line\_items](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.line_items.md) or [Session.price](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.price.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [metadata?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.metadata.md) | { \[key: string\]: any; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format. |
|  [mode](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.mode.md) | "subscription" \| "payment" | The mode of the Checkout Session. |
|  [payment\_method\_types?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.payment_method_types.md) | [PaymentMethodType](./firestore-stripe-payments.paymentmethodtype.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> A list of the types of payment methods (e.g., <code>card</code>) this Checkout Session can accept. Defaults to <code>[&quot;card&quot;]</code>. |
|  [price?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.price.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID of the Stripe price object purchased with this session. A session is guaranteed to contain either [Session.line\_items](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.line_items.md) or [Session.price](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.price.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [promotion\_code?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.promotion_code.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The promotion code to apply to this Session. |
|  [quantity?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.quantity.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The quantity of item purchased. Defaults to 1. |
|  [success\_url](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.success_url.md) | string | The URL to which Stripe should send customers when payment or setup is complete. |
|  [tax\_id\_collection?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.tax_id_collection.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Controls tax ID collection settings for the session. |
|  [trial\_from\_plan?](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.trial_from_plan.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates if a planâ€™s <code>trial_period_days</code> should be applied to the subscription. Defaults to <code>true</code>. |
|  [url](./firestore-stripe-payments.session.url.md) | string | The URL to the Checkout Session. Redirect the user to this URL to complete the payment. |
